title: Date of the contract
explanation: The date is explicitly stated as 'dated as of November 15, 2012' at the top of the document.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A is clearly identified as 'THE BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA ("Party A")'.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is clearly identified as 'Halifax Funding LLC ("Party B")'.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: The text explicitly states that in relation to Party A, 'Specified Entity' means none.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: The text states that in relation to Party B, the Specified Entity is 'KKR Asset Management LLC'.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The definition of 'Specified Transaction' matches the standard Section 14 language in the ISDA Master Agreement, with no modifications or additional restrictions.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Cross Default' provisions will apply to Party A and will apply to Party B, indicating both parties are covered.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not mention 'borrowed money' or whether it is included in Specified Indebtedness.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that Specified Indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of Party A's banking business.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: No fixed amount is specified for Party A; the threshold is defined as a percentage.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: No specific currency is provided; the threshold is calculated as a percentage of shareholders' equity, which may be in any currency.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to 3% of the total shareholders' equity of Party A'.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: The reference is 'shareholders' equity' as per the definition.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: No fixed amount is specified for Party B; the threshold is defined as a percentage.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: No specific currency is provided; the threshold is calculated as a percentage of Net Asset Value.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to 3% of its Net Asset Value'.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: The reference is 'Net Asset Value' as per the definition.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions will apply to Party A and will apply to Party B, indicating both parties are applicable.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: The provision states that Automatic Early Termination does not apply to either party by default, but will apply to a party if certain bankruptcy events occur and a court order prohibits the other party from designating an Early Termination Date. Thus, it can potentially apply to both Party A and Party B under specified circumstances.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Termination Currency' means United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code USD.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: No email address is provided for Party A in the given text; only physical address, facsimile, and telephone numbers are listed.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: No email address is provided for Party B in the given text; only physical address, facsimile, and telephone numbers are listed.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: The text states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not applicable.'

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: Process agent is not applicable for Party A, so no name is provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: Process agent is not applicable for Party A, so no address is provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: The text states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Halifax Funding LLC is: National Registered Agents, Inc., 160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904.'

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: The process agent for Party B is named as 'National Registered Agents, Inc.' in the text.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: The address for Party B's process agent is given as '160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904.'

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text states 'Party A is a Multibranch Party'.

title: Party A offices
explanation: The text specifies Party A shall be acting out of its New York and Toronto Offices.

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text states 'Party B is not a Multibranch Party'.

title: Party B offices
explanation: Party B is not a Multibranch Party, so no offices are listed.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text states 'The Calculation Agent is Party A unless otherwise agreed in a Confirmation in respect to the relevant Transaction.' No other agreement is mentioned, so Party A is the default Calculation Agent.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states the agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
